text: I have mixed feelings about this decision to put more energy into developing a DnD feature on the page editor level.
I would say try the beta, voice your thoughts on how the implementation could be done in a way that you’d be comfortable with.
was this discussed at the AMA? or are  you just musing
is there a post talking about this somewhere?
They are not replacing flex columns entirely, it’s basically a new form of flex column
<@UD53A9UUR> it’s something they’ve had in beta for a few months, it’s a 2D flex column basically instead of 1D
is this related to that long exchange a between jon and adrian?
also, 5.12 am, <@UDC5GRX6E>?

Has anyone run into an issue that throws this error when publishing a web page? We have no required fields. I believe it has something to the fact that we have SVG code in a custom module text field, but this has never been an issue until yesterday. Thanks!
Lol. It kept me up
clearly :slightly_smiling_face:

yeah I had this before; that's when I _had_ a required field, but removed it. In already existent module instances the field old field configuration is still there (to make sure content will not be lost or modified I guess). When you remove the module from the page and add it again you can save it as normal. You'll have to add your content manually though.
any idea if they are bringing back the bulk upload for redirects in the new URL mapping?
:wave: - Hi everyone, Elizabeth from HubSpot with a question. I'm wondering if some of you may have seen a few badge notification emails from our community forums today?

If so, my sincerest apologies for any confusion and inconvenience -- we were trying to do some pre-work for a new forum experience and our vendor did not correctly change to prevent these emails from going out. So, that cat is out of the bag! We're going to be merging our current <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com> and <http://integrate.HubSpot.com|integrate.HubSpot.com> forums in January 2019 to bring you a better and faster support experience!
Happy to answer any questions as well!

:sprocket: :video_camera: HubSpot Vidyard Integration question: I’m finding the video player takes awhile to become actually playable especially on mobile, just wondering if there is anything that can be done to improve that time to active state? because it doesn’t even show the play button so it just looks like an image for like 5 seconds on mobile.
Yeah there are a few issues that I am seeing. Like you cant get the url of the video anymore.
Yes!  I thought it was just me!!

Has the Captcha option  moved from the Marketing > Forms section? I can’t find it as referenced in this article: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/forms/prevent-spam-form-submissions>
I just enabled it on a form last week. Should still be there

ah, sorry I was looking in the global settings. I found it.
Does it still work if I set display: none on the captcha badge that shows up?
No clue. Let me know ;)
can’t just hide reCaptcha legally - see discussion here: <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44543157/how-to-hide-the-google-invisible-recaptcha-badge>
so did anyone actually get a bunch of these?
has anyone actually received a bunch of those badge notifications from the community forums?
i did not
and was sad
thanks for the info <@UD53A9UUR>
No worries
